description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A fun game of Memory for the whole family.  Up to 4 players take turns flipping cards to find their matches.  This Xbox version saves you the trouble of laying out all those rows & rows of cards on the carpet.  Small grid and rumble turn indicator make it child friendly or try larger grid for more challenge.  We wrote this to play with our 4 kids and hope you will enjoy it as much as we do :)
